resources.string: Do you have construction materials or building furnishings you don’t need but don’t want to throw away? Post a listing to Endelevu to find someone who can make use of what you don’t need.

We welcome you to donate your surplus, recyclable or re-usable materials to our charity projects which help renovate or upgrade school and hospitals in low-income communities. For donation acceptance, please email photos, dimensions and model
Looking for construction materials that might be available for reuse in your area? Members of the Endelevu can list material available as well as material needed.
